name: ARPB_CHG_ENTRY_DX
description: The table lists all diagnoses on a charge entry session in which the charge was posted.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique internal ID of the transaction record representing this charge.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DX_ID
columns.description: The diagnosis internal ID (EDG .1) associated with the charge entry session.  This diagnosis is from the primary codeset.

columns.name: DX_QUALIFIER_C_NAME
columns.description: Qualifier for the diagnosis on this line.  Indicates if diagnosis is:  1 - Active 2 - Acute 3 - Chronic 4 - Inactive 5 - Temporary
